ygData.subject: Paw of Opalla and Desperate request for aid.
ygData.msgSnippet: So basically those of us who still have to rely on Smiting are screwed.... bloody HELL...  Was hoping that this might be an item I could possibly get... Add in
ygData.messageBody:
So basically those of us who still have to rely on Smiting are screwed....
bloody HELL... Was hoping that this might be an item I could possibly
get...

Add in the fact that now everyone knows about the quest ....

by the time i manage to get the Paw they'll be a dime a dozen like
bloodforge hammers.... so much for having a semi rare item...

I've already wasted 10PP trying to get p34 for the Testament as well...
but I'm dubious to him so I doubt I'm gonna get anything...

ok, new topic....

Where can a 21st level Cleric(human) possibly go to get some XP... I'm
sooo tired of pull and kill in Permafrost and Unrest... with the all the
deaths I'm barely gaining XP.... I lose like 3/4 to a full bub of XP
everytime I die... I've been a half a bub from 22 three times now and RIGHT
now I'm at less than a bub into 21... for level 20 I could hunt scarecrows
to make up for the XP I lost in Perma... but now I get jack from em...

I've tried the undead at lake rathe, but it's usually camped like high holy
hell and everyone is so freakin obsessive there... I accidently Expulse a
db some guy is walking towards and he chews my head off for 20 minutes on
shout... telling everyone I'm a KSer... right, sure, a freakin CLERIC
KSing... HAHAHAHAHA

Help Please! getting SO frustrated....
